price: Kuma Allah bã zai jinkirta wa wani rai ba idan ajalinsa ya je. Kuma Allah Masani ne ga abin da suke aikatãwa.
arabic: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walan yu-akhira al-lahu nafsan idhā jāa ajaluhā wal-lahu khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
